DOC.detailed_description: This single center , open-label , dose-escalation study evaluate efficacy , define biochemical endpoint , safety profile ACTIMMUNE ADO2 subject . The investigator treat 12 ADO2 subject ( child adults age 3-65 ) Actimmune® via dose escalation protocol dose 50 µg/m2 subcutaneously three time per week ( TIW ) 8 week . If serum CTX increase 25 % week 8 , dose increase 100 µg/m2 subcutaneously TIW . Individual subject ACTIMMUNE administration increase bone resorption marker 14 week trial eligible 1 year extension trial .
